duties_responsibilities.duty: Boost Jira Align adoption and best practices.
Collaborate with product area leaders to assist them in the most feasible use of the tool.
Provide training, mentoring, and client-engagement expertise.
Proficiency in agile tools and data analysis.
Strong communication and presentation skills, both written and oral, to build consensus, lead change, and promote acceptability within the organization.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (Master's preferred)
